bots.description: A test open source bot list

application_id.modal: The OAuth ID is the ID which is used when users invite your bot via the OAuth workflow. In almost all cases, this ID is the same as your Bot ID. You will only need to take action if your bot has a difference between the two.
application_id.placeholder: The ID used in the OAuth link.
application_id.title: OAuth ID

authors.modal: Enter a single ID of an owner of the bot.
authors.title: Bot Authors

bot_support.small: Leave this field empty if you don't like helping people
bot_support.title: Support URL

client_id.modal1: The bot ID is a number which uniquely identifies the bot user. You can retrieve it by clicking the "Copy" button within the Discord Developer portal.
client_id.modal2: You can also find the ID by enabling "Developer Mode" in the Discord settings, and then right clicking your bot and pressing "Copy ID". Be sure not to copy the ID of the message.
client_id.placeholder: The ID of the bot user
client_id.title: Bot ID

errors.bot_authors_error: You must have at least 1 author of the bot, and all Author IDs must be numeric
errors.bot_customisable_error: The customisability of the prefix must be either ticked, or unticked
errors.bot_description_error: The short description must have a length between 10 and 64
errors.bot_githubowner_error: The GitHub owner needs to be a valid GitHub user. Leave blank if you do not have a GitHub account.
errors.bot_githubrepo_error: The GitHub repository needs to be a valid string. Leave blank if you do not have a GitHub repository.
errors.bot_id_error: The Bot ID needs to be filled out, and numeric
errors.bot_invite_error: The Invite URL needs to be filled out, and as a valid HTTPS link
errors.bot_languages: You must add a single language before continuing
errors.bot_mentionable_error: The mentionabiliity of the prefix must be either ticked, or unticked
errors.bot_name_error: The bot must have a name of length between 4 and 32.
errors.bot_nsfw_error: The NSFW status must be either ticked, or unticked
errors.bot_oauth_error: The OAuth ID needs to be numeric
errors.bot_page_error: The long description must have a length between 20 and 10000
errors.bot_prefix_error: You must have at least 1 prefix, of max length 10.
errors.bot_support_error: The Support URL needs to be a valid HTTPS link

invite.modal: Please make sure "Bot ID" has been filled in with your Discord bot's ID
invite.title: Invite URL

languages.modal: You can add different descriptions for different languages supported by this website, to better target your audience. To add a language, select your language and click "Add this language". You can then fill out the details for that language.
languages.title: Languages

locale.pleasehelp: Are you a good translator? Click here.
